# isAlchemyTransport

Checks whether the given transport is an AlchemyTransport.

## Import

```ts
import { isAlchemyTransport } from "@account-kit/infra";
```

## Usage

```ts
import { isAlchemyTransport } from "@account-kit/infra";
if (isAlchemyTransport(transport)) {
  // do things here that are only when transport is an AlchemyTransport
}
```

## Parameters

### x

`Transport | AlchemyTransport`
The transport to check.

## Returns

`boolean`
True if the transport is of type AlchemyTransport, otherwise false.
